SEARCH

Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
Scheduler
public class Scheduler extends Object
This class represents a scheduler that manages appointments. It allows users to schedule, cancel, reschedule, and view appointments. The appointments can be displayed in various sorted orders.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the scheduler and processes user input commands. Commands include scheduling, canceling, rescheduling, and displaying appointments.

    • appExistsAlready

      public boolean appExistsAlready(Appointment newApp)
      Checks if the given appointment already exists in the appointment list.
      Parameters:
      newApp - the new appointment to check.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment exists, false otherwise.

    • conflictApp

      private boolean conflictApp(Appointment appointment)
      Checks if there is a conflict with the given appointment in terms of date, timeslot, and provider.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to check for conflicts.
      Returns:
      true if there is a conflict, false otherwise.

    • scheduleCommand

      public void scheduleCommand(String input)
      Schedules a new appointment based on the user's input. Validates the date, timeslot, provider, and other details before scheduling.
      Parameters:
      input - the input string containing appointment details.

    • formatTimeslot

      public String formatTimeslot(Timeslot timeslot)
      Formats the timeslot to a human-readable string format.
      Parameters:
      timeslot - the timeslot to format.
      Returns:
      the formatted string representation of the timeslot.

    • cancelCommand

      public void cancelCommand(String input)
      Cancels an existing appointment based on the user's input. Validates and removes the appointment from the list if found.
      Parameters:
      input - the input string containing appointment details to cancel.

    • rescheduleCommand

      public void rescheduleCommand(String input)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new timeslot based on the user's input. Validates the appointment before performing the rescheduling.
      Parameters:
      input - the input string containing appointment details for rescheduling.
